name: Infinite Silence
description:
Infinite Silence is an experimental piece of non-linear, interactive music. There are three interconnected and surreal spaces, each representing a piece of music, and player traversal causes musical changes. This is an experiment in player-driven music. You decide what and when you want to listen to the various parts of a piece of music. You cannot die. Do not fear falling. Travel downwards.

Note: Intended resolution is either 1920x1080 or 2560x1440.

Art, design, programming, music by Michael Overton Brown.
